snippet: President Moncef Marzouki lifted the state of emergency that had been in force since the country’s 2011 uprising.
abstract: Pres Moncef Marzouki of Tunisia lifts state of emergency that has been in force since 2011 uprising, in sign of growing confidence in country since political accords were reached in December 2013 imposition of state of emergency, put in place by former Pres Zine el-Abidine Ben Ali during protests that set off Arab Spring, have been largely ignored by public.
lead_paragraph: President Moncef Marzouki lifted the state of emergency that had been in force since the country’s 2011 uprising.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
